sense.gloss: to stuff into, to jam, to cram, to pack, to fill, to plug, to stop up
to shorten, to move closer together
to focus intently on, to strain oneself to do
to go through thoroughly, to work out (details), to bring to a conclusion, to wind up
to be on duty, to be stationed
to corner (esp. an opponent's king in shogi), to trap, to checkmate
to cut off (one's finger as an act of apology), to catch (one's finger in a door, etc.)
to do non-stop, to do continuously, to keep doing (without a break)
to do completely, to do thoroughly
to force someone into a difficult situation by ...

sdata.j: その↑箱↑↓はこ↓にそんなに|↑詰↑↓つ↓める|と↑底↑↓そこ↓が↑抜↑↓ぬ↓けるよ。
sdata.e: If you stuff the box too full, the bottom will fall out.

sdata.j: あまり↑根↑↓こん↓を|↑詰↑↓つ↓める|のは↑体↑↓からだ↓に↑良↑↓よ↓くないよ。
sdata.e: If you push yourself too hard, you'll make yourself ill.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓がスーツケースに↑荷物↑↓にもつ↓を|↑詰↑↓つ↓める|のを↑手伝↑↓てつだ↓ってくれませんか。
sdata.e: Will you help me pack up my suitcase?

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑私↑↓わたし↓に↑生活↑↓せいかつ↓↑費↑↓ひ↓を↑切↑↓き↓り|↑詰↑↓つ↓める|ようにといった。
sdata.e: He told me to cut down the cost of its production.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓らは↑出資↑↓しゅっし↓を↑切↑↓き↓り|↑詰↑↓つ↓める|でしょう。
sdata.e: They will cut down on their expenses.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑私↑↓わたし↓が↑荷物↑↓にもつ↓をスーツケースに|↑詰↑↓つ↓める|のを↑手伝↑↓てつだ↓ってくれた。
sdata.e: She helped me pack my suitcase.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓がスーツケースに↑荷物↑↓にもつ↓を|↑詰↑↓つ↓める|のを↑手伝↑↓てつだ↓ってくれませんか。
sdata.e: Will you help me pack my suitcase?
